snippet: Art Basel Miami Beach is under way this weekend, and even before it opened, some critics said it was an example of something wrong in the art world.
abstract: Art Basel Miami Beach opens amidst backlash by prominent art writers and critics, who say that fair's celebration of excess is example of how much art world has come to be defined by money.
lead_paragraph: Art Basel Miami Beach is under way this weekend, and even before it opened, some critics said it was an example of something wrong in the art world.

headline.seo: Art and Commerce Meet in Miami Beach
headline.main: An Art World Gathering, Divided by Money
headline.print_headline: An Art World Gathering, Divided by Money
